# Stormwater Permit Fees (2025-26)

## Construction General Permit (CGP)

### Standard Construction Projects

**Fee Calculation:**
- Base fee: $511
- Per acre fee: $54
- Formula: $511 + ($54 × total disturbed acres)
- Maximum: $11,311

### Example Calculations

| Project Size | Fee Calculation | Total Fee |
|--------------|-----------------|----------|
| 0.5 acres | $511 + ($54 × 0.5) | $538 |
| 1 acre | $511 + ($54 × 1) | $565 |
| 5 acres | $511 + ($54 × 5) | $781 |
| 10 acres | $511 + ($54 × 10) | $1,051 |
| 50 acres | $511 + ($54 × 50) | $3,211 |
| 100 acres | $511 + ($54 × 100) | $5,911 |
| 200+ acres | Maximum | $11,311 |

### Rainfall Erosivity Waiver
- **Fee:** $200 (flat fee)
- **Eligibility:** Small projects meeting specific criteria
- Low erosivity conditions required

## Industrial General Permit (IGP)

### Annual Fees by Facility Size

| Industrial Acres | Annual Fee |
|------------------|------------|
| Less than 1 acre | $1,701 |
| 1 to less than 5 acres | $1,723 |
| 5 acres or more | $1,873 |

### What Counts as Industrial Acres?
- Areas where industrial materials/activities exposed to stormwater
- Outdoor storage areas
- Loading/unloading areas
- Equipment maintenance areas
- Parking areas where industrial activities occur

## Municipal Stormwater (MS4)

### Phase I MS4 (Large/Medium Cities)
| Population | Annual Fee |
|------------|------------|
| ≥ 250,000 | $27,293 |
| 100,000-249,999 | $21,835 |

### Phase II MS4 (Small MS4s)
| Population | Annual Fee |
|------------|------------|
| 50,000-99,999 | $18,196 |
| 10,000-49,999 | $10,920-18,196 |
| < 10,000 | $3,641-7,279 |

## When Fees Are Due

**Construction:**
- Before permit issuance (NOT)
- At time of enrollment

**Industrial:**
- Annual renewal
- Invoice sent by State Water Board

**Municipal:**
- Annual billing cycle
- Due by specified date on invoice

## Fee Calculator

**Online Calculator:** [CGP Per-Acre Fee Reference (PDF)](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/resources/fees/water_quality/docs/cgp-per-acre.pdf)

## Contact

**Stormwater Program:** [SWRCB Stormwater Program](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/water_issues/programs/stormwater/)
**Fee Questions:** [Regional Water Board](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/waterboards_map.html)

## Take Action

1. **Calculate your construction fee** -- Use the formula ($511 + $54 per acre) and verify against the [CGP Per-Acre Fee Reference (PDF)](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/resources/fees/water_quality/docs/cgp-per-acre.pdf).
2. **Review the full fee schedule** -- Download the [FY 2025-26 Fee Schedule (PDF)](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/resources/fees/stakeholder/docs/2025/fy2526-wq-feeschedule.pdf) for construction, industrial, and municipal stormwater fee details.
3. **Enroll via SMARTS** -- Visit the [SMARTS portal](https://smarts.waterboards.ca.gov) to submit your Notice of Intent and pay enrollment fees for construction or industrial stormwater permits.
4. **Contact the Stormwater Program** -- Visit the [SWRCB Stormwater Program](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/water_issues/programs/stormwater/) page for guidance on which permit category applies to your project.
